data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I believe dialects are an interesting aspect of culture and they should be protected. And to do so, language should not be standardized. Language is one of the most important parts of any culture. It is the way by which people communicate with one another, build relationships, and create a sense of community. Dialects is a form of language that represents a sub-culture. It is also important to preserve such culture because the dying of dialects is happening worldwide. This is because of the standardization of a named language in a country, for example, Chinese in China.
data.referenceText: How do you feel about dialects? Do you believe they are an interesting aspect of culture? Or do you think language should be standardized?
data.referenceTranslate: 你对方言有什么看法？你认为方言是文化中有趣的一面吗?或者你认为语言应该标准化吗?
